Articles.Content:
Title says it all.

I know we have EVE BUT EVE is not very cartoonish. I would like a style of cloud that matches the art style of the rest of the game (for example, look at the clouds from the VAB view.

Something puffy and cartooney like that.

Title says it all.

I know we have EVE BUT EVE is not very cartoonish. I would like a style of cloud that matches the art style of the rest of the game (for example, look at the clouds from the VAB view.

Something puffy and cartooney like that.

I don't think, that KSP is that much cartoonish, EVE clouds are good for me.
